text: 4.3 Sng 69.28, Luk 10.20, Lep 3.5, 20.12 Pen nad, bɨyad ayɨp jɨmñɨl wog gɨpul ak, nep abe agebin. Bin omɨŋal anɨb ak kɨlop gɨñe, jɨmñɨl yenɨmil. Bin omɨŋal anɨb ak sek, bɨ Klemed ak sek, binɨb ogɨnap sek, kɨli ned yad ayɨp takaw teplep ak jɨmñɨl kɨles gɨl agñolɨgɨpun. God ne yɨb kɨlop pel mɨdep mɨj ayaŋ kɨl tɨkak.
